verses.verse: (For the choir director. A Psalm of David.) Hear <S%H8085><s%> my voice, <S%H6963><s%> O God, <S%H430><s%> in my complaint; <S%H7879><s%> Preserve <S%H5341><s%> my life <S%H9132><s%> from dread <S%H6343><s%> of the enemy. <S%H340><s%>
Hide <S%H5641><s%> me from the secret <S%H5475><s%> counsel <S%H5475><s%> of evildoers, <S%H7489><s%> From the tumult <S%H9543><s%> of those who do <S%H6466><s%> iniquity, <S%H205><s%>
Who <S%H834><s%> have sharpened <S%H8150><s%> their tongue <S%H3956><s%> like a sword. <S%H2719><s%> They aimed <S%H1869><s%> bitter <S%H4751><s%> speech <S%H1697><s%> [as] their arrow, <S%H2671><s%>
To shoot <S%H3384><s%> from concealment <S%H4565><s%> at the blameless; <S%H8535><s%> Suddenly <S%H6597><s%> they shoot <S%H3384><s%> at him, and do not fear. <S%H3372><s%>

They hold <S%H2388><s%> fast <S%H2388><s%> to themselves an evil <S%H7451><s%> purpose; <S%H1697><s%> They talk <S%H5608><s%> of laying <S%H2934><s%> snares <S%H4170><s%> secretly; <S%H2934><s%> They say, <S%H559><s%> "Who <S%H4310><s%> can see <S%H7200><s%> them?"

They devise <S%H2664><s%> injustices, <S%H9390><s%> [saying,] "We are ready <S%H8552><s%> with a well-conceived plot <S%H2665><s%>"; For the inward <S%H7130><s%> thought <S%H7130><s%> and the heart <S%H3820><s%> of a man <S%H376><s%> are deep. <S%H6013><s%>
But God <S%H430><s%> will shoot <S%H3384><s%> at them with an arrow; <S%H2671><s%> Suddenly <S%H6597><s%> they will be wounded. <S%H4347><s%>
So they will make him stumble; <S%H3782><s%> Their own tongue <S%H3956><s%> is against <S%H5921><s%> them; All <S%H3605><s%> who see <S%H7200><s%> them will shake <S%H5074><s%> the head.

Then all <S%H3605><s%> men <S%H120><s%> will fear, <S%H3372><s%> And will declare <S%H5046><s%> the work <S%H6467><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> And will consider <S%H7919><s%> what <S%H4639><s%> He has done. <S%H4639><s%>

The righteous <S%H6662><s%> man <S%H6662><s%> will be glad <S%H8055><s%> in the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> and will take <S%H2620><s%> refuge <S%H2620><s%> in Him; And all <S%H3605><s%> the upright <S%H3477><s%> in heart <S%H3820><s%> will glory. <S%H1984><s%>
